long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"TagName revolutionizes your web experience by offering a browser extension that simplifies web navigation. Forget cumbersome URL typing or copying and pasting. TagName's shortcuts have got you covered.
🌟 Features & Benefits 🌟

    🚀 Efficiency: One shortcut is all it takes to get you where you want to go.

    ⚡ Speed: Reach your favorite sites faster than you ever thought possible.

    🛋️ Convenience: Your go-to websites are just a shortcut away.

    🔧 Customization: Create shortcuts that fit your browsing habits.

    🎯 Ease of Use: No technical expertise required.

    🛡️ Safety: Rest easy knowing our curated list includes only trusted and verified websites.

🎯 How Does TagName Work? 🎯

TagName uses a DNS-based system to make web navigation a breeze. Just type your shortcut into the browser's address bar, and TagName checks tagname.org for the corresponding URL. If the URL exists, you're there in a flash. If not, nothing happens—making it risk-free.
📜 See the Full List of Shortcuts 📜
1 letter shorcuts : https://tagname.org/sc1/
2 letter shortcuts : https://tagname.org/sc2/
3 google services shortcuts : https://tagname.org/sc3/
